column1: When you cast a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.

"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."
